main.name: Marzuki
main.bio: Hello! I am Marzuki. I'm a FullStack Web Developer, mostly working on FrontEnd.

resume.skillmessage: I have skills in PHP and JavaScript, and for the frameworks i'm currently using Codeigniter 3, Laravel, NuxtJS, and ReactJS
